org.apache.manifoldcf.crawler.system

Class PipelineSpecification

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.manifoldcf.crawler.system.PipelineSpecification
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPipelineConnections, IPipelineSpecification, IPipelineSpecificationBasic

    public class PipelineSpecification
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPipelineSpecification
    Class which handles pipeline specifications that include current (new) description strings.

        Specified by:
